item.title: about me
item.description:
I’m fumerem.

  • c++ / python / rust
  • neovim / vs code
  • you can find me here https://github.com/fumerem
  • you can contact me fumerem@gmail.com or 1187519105@qq.com

​ Unlike the vast majority of people,I hate trends,especially pop music and stars that people rave about and promote.I’m more comfortable with the classics,they calm me down.I don’t have much to write about because not many people will pay attention to me.

​ Furthermore,I sincerely thank the After-Dark and its creator,Josh Habdas,have been seemingly yeeted from the Internet,when I tried all the hexo themes but was not satisfied,wanted to develop my own theme but lacked energy and time,and had to choose hugo eventually.
